entities.description: A specific question or prompt in the survey related to substance use and symptoms.
Recorded responses or answers to the survey items.
Indicators or experiences related to substance withdrawal.
Symptoms experienced within the past 12 months due to alcohol withdrawal.
The number of responses provided for a particular survey item.
The percentage of total responses for a particular survey item.

relationships.description: Connects the survey to specific items or questions in the survey.
Connects a survey respondent to their recorded answers.
Connects a time period of experiencing alcohol withdrawal to the specific symptoms observed.
Relates survey responses to the frequency of responses.
Relates survey responses to the percentage of responses.
